executive_summary: Acme Corp is a leading retailer in the FMCG sector, known for innovative products and a strong online presence. This proposal outlines a social media campaign and performance creatives to boost brand engagement.
objective: Increase brand engagement through social media and performance campaigns

scope_of_services.details: Includes social strategy, page management, content calendar creation, asset creation, and monthly reporting.
Includes banner masters and adapts for digital ad campaigns.

custom_items.description: Custom performance banner for Google Ads

associated_team.description: Creates content for posts and ads
Designs static, video, and banner creatives

sla.brief_deadline: Changes or briefs submitted after 4 PM will be addressed the next business day
sla.job_lists: Daily job lists shared with client by 10 AM
sla.account_reports: Monthly account performance reports delivered by the 5th of each month
sla.sop: All assets reviewed by client within 48 hours of delivery

standard_asset_definitions.definition: Up to 30 seconds of animation using stock imagery or footage with basic animation and typography. Excludes illustrated videos and complex animations.

inclusions: Up to 15 social media creatives (8 static, 7 videos)

commercial_proposal.comments: Includes strategy, page management, and reporting
Custom banner included at no extra cost

notes: Client to provide brand guidelines by May 10, 2025.
